attributes.action: Give the Kashmiris the right of self determination.
attributes.additional_details:
Creation of new policy in favour of those caught in the middle of this conflict.

To; Creat a new viewpoint favouring the Kashmiris right to exist as it's them whom are suffering due to their ethnicity/heritage.

; Creat a meeting for both kashmiri party's of each side to come together and form a new self determination plan.

; And finally provide the Kashmiris people the resource and assistance it dierly required.
attributes.background: Creat a new policy for Kashmir.

rejection.details:
You could start a new petition calling for a clear action that is the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament. There's already a petition calling for the UK Government to urge India to de-escalate conflict and respect the special status of Kashmir, which you might like to sign if it calls for something you'd to happen. You're more likely to get action on this issue if you sign and share a single petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/269094
